General_Description: '''Wrath of Hephaistos''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Weakening [[Sparta]]n [[Spartan army|forces]] would greatly help the [[Athens|Athenian]] [[Athenian army|army]]."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and destroyed a number of Spartan supplies all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Forced Starvation]] and [[Supplies Lower than Demand.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
